text: Ara smarana karuna, yakhana apanara raba adama-santanera pitha theke tara bansadharake bera karena ebam tadera nijedera sambad'dhe sbikarokti [1] grahana karena ebam balena, ‘ami ki tomadera raba na'i [2]?’ Tara balechila, ‘hyam abasya'i, amara saksi ra'ilama.’ Eta e jan'ye ye, tomara yena kiyamatera dina na bala, ‘amara to e bisaye gaphela chilama [3].‘
